医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
西奈山项目获得 400 万美元拨款，用于了解克罗恩病的早期阶段西奈山伊坎医学院获得了 Leona M. 和 Harry B. Helmsley 慈善信托基金超过 400 万美元的拨款，用于支持一项创新研究项目，该项目旨在了解克罗恩病在出现明显症状之前的早期阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Mount-Sinai-project-receives-244M-grant-to-understand-the-early-stages-of-Crohns-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Mount-Sinai-project-receives-244M-grant-to-understand-the-early-stages-of-Crohns-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=877cfbc9-e122-4dc0-93cf-1ad896d530a6 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 16:12:25 -0500 Mount Sinai project receives $4M grant to understand the early stages of Crohn's disease
研究揭示了艾滋病毒在细胞入侵过程中如何蠕动进入细胞核因为病毒必须劫持别人的细胞才能复制，所以它们非常擅长——发明各种各样的技巧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Study-reveals-how-HIV-squirms-its-way-into-the-nucleus-during-cell-invasion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Study-reveals-how-HIV-squirms-its-way-into-the-nucleus-during-cell-invasion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebb141f4-722d-4991-8016-f82810dd059b Thu, 25 Jan 2024 16:02:23 -0500 Study reveals how HIV squirms its way into the nucleus during cell invasion
汗纹身：麻省大学阿默斯特分校开发亲肤监测仪以获取健康见解马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校的研究人员因开发一种新型汗液监测器而获奖，该监测器可以像临时纹身一样应用于皮肤，并评估存在的分子，例如皮质醇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Sweat-tattoos-UMass-Amherst-develops-skin-friend-monitors-for-health-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Sweat-tattoos-UMass-Amherst-develops-skin-friend-monitors-for-health-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=281feae6-f1b1-4a92-a27b-8c46646049fb Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:57:30 -0500 Sweat tattoos: UMass Amherst develops skin-friendly monitors for health insights
广泛接触有毒金属与中年女性卵巢提前衰老有关根据发表在《临床内分泌与代谢杂志》上的新研究，接触有毒金属的中年女性在接近更年期时，卵巢中的卵子可能会减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Widespread-exposure-to-有毒-金属-linked-with-earlier-aging-of-the-ovaries-in-middle-ged-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Widespread-exposure-to-有毒-金属-linked-with-earlier-aging-of-the-ovaries-in-middle-ged-women.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d959b19-a69c-4b2e-aa88-2db10b44cd36 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:51:00 -0500 Widespread exposure to toxic metals linked with earlier aging of the ovaries in middle-aged women
欧盟倡议利用光和人工智能开发先进的诊断技术在 UPC 传感器、仪器和系统开发中心的领导下，一个由大学、医院和公司组成的国际联盟正在开发基于光和人工智能的新技术，以改善多种疾病的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/EU-initiative-develops-advanced-diagnostics-with-light-and-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/EU-initiative-develops-advanced-diagnostics-with-light-and-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2269e7f-90c5-48a9-94f9-b55ffa2bc053 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:43:37 -0500 EU initiative develops advanced diagnostics with light and AI
专家敦促将低钠富钾盐纳入高血压治疗指南一个国际专家组今天在美国心脏协会的科学杂志《高血压》上呼吁将低钠富含钾盐的建议纳入高血压治疗指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Experts-urge-the-inclusion-of-low-sodium-potassium-enriched-salt-in-hypertension-treatment-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Experts-urge-the-inclusion-of-low-sodium-potassium-enriched-salt-in-hypertension-treatment-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb058df-0237-44db-8cb8-cae46736dc43 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:10:32 -0500 Experts urge the inclusion of low-sodium potassium-enriched salt in hypertension treatment guidelines
改善儿科脓毒症诊断的新全球标准根据新的研究结果，儿童败血症的诊断得到了改进。由该大学的 Luregn Schlapbach 和苏黎世大学儿童医院共同领导的一个国际研究小组利用人工智能分析了超过 350 万患有这种危及生命的疾病的儿童的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/New-global-criteria-for-improved-diagnosis-of-pediatric-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/New-global-criteria-for-improved-diagnosis-of-pediatric-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3239f3c6-c5af-49fd-a26e-b4bc3be76228 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:04:51 -0500 New global criteria for improved diagnosis of pediatric sepsis
瓦莫洛龙治疗杜氏肌营养不良症的公正评估药物瓦莫洛龙（Agamree）被誉为治疗杜氏肌营养不良症（DMD）有前途的新药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Unbiased-assessment-of-vamorolone-for-treating-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Unbiased-assessment-of-vamorolone-for-treating-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb7c0dfd-da2c-4697-ba4b-533c006e35cb Thu, 25 Jan 2024 14:59:36 -0500 Unbiased assessment of vamorolone for treating Duchenne muscular dystrophy
关于放射学人工智能工具的开发和使用发表的开创性联合声明美国放射学会与世界各地其他四个放射学会密切合作，发布了一份关于放射学人工智能 (AI) 工具开发和使用的联合声明。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Groundwriting-joint-statement-issued-on-the-development-and-use-of-AI-tools-in-radiology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Groundwriting-joint-statement-issued-on-the-development-and-use-of-AI-tools-in-radiology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f03d765-6f7c-462f-83da-2b0d57c5028b Thu, 25 Jan 2024 14:53:43 -0500 Groundbreaking joint statement issued on the development and use of AI tools in radiology
试点研究证明了对患有创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 的退伍军人进行多模式团体治疗的可行性2016 年从美国陆军退役后，劳伦斯居民马特·黑斯廷斯 (Matt Hastings) 陷入了困境。黑斯廷斯是一名前战斗航空旅旅长，他是一个拥有急需技能的人：他是唯一一个能够执行某些任务的人，他拥有其他教官所需的资格和经验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Pilot-study-demonstrates-feasibility-of-multimodal-group-treatment-for-veterans-with-PTSD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Pilot-study-demonstrates-feasibility-of-multimodal-group-treatment-for-veterans-with-PTSD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c64c071-7375-426b-be97-f556d9a24f3c Thu, 25 Jan 2024 11:17:00 -0500 Pilot study demonstrates feasibility of multimodal group treatment for veterans with PTSD
